        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_3d7e018486830eac7ba63cacc47d7e83fef0c9a0</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Amide links in polypeptides and proteins</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Amidlinks in den Polypeptiden und in den 
Proteinen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Liens d'amide en polypeptides et protéines</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ligações do amido nos polypeptides e nas 
proteínas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Collegamenti dell'ammide in polipeptidi e 
proteine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συνδέσεις αμιδίων polypeptides και τις πρωτεϊ'νες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conexiones de la amida en polipéptidos y 
proteínas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how the polypeptide and protein join together through a peptide link to form a dipeptide and a water molecule. It shows which atoms are lost when water is formed .</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">amino acids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dipeptide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">peptide link</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">polypeptides</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">proteins</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie das Polypeptid und das
Protein zusammen durch ein Peptidlink verbinden, um ein Dipeptid und 
ein Wassermolekül zu bilden. Sie zeigt, welche Atome verloren 
sind, wenn Wasser gebildet wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment le polypeptide 
et la protéine se joignent ensemble par un lien de peptide pour 
former un dipeptide et une molécule d'eau. Elle montre quels 
atomes sont détruits quand l'eau est formée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como o polypeptide e a 
proteína juntam junto com uma ligação do peptide para dar forma a 
um dipeptide e a uma molécula de água. Mostra que átomos são
perdidos quando a água é dada forma.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come il polipeptide e
la proteina si uniscono insieme con un collegamento del peptide per 
formare un dipeptide e una molecola di acqua. Mostra quali atomi
sono persi quando l'acqua è formata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς polypeptide και η
πρωτεϊ'νη ενώνουν μαζί μέσω μιας σύνδεσης πεπτιδίων για να 
διαμορφώσουν μια διπεπτίδη και ένα μόριο ύδατος. Εμφανίζει
ποια άτομα χάνονται όταν διαμορφώνεται το ύδωρ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo el polipéptido y
la proteína ensamblan juntos con una conexión del peptide para 
formar un dipeptide y una molécula de agua. Muestra se pierden 
qué átomos cuando se forma el agua.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aminosäuren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dipeptid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Peptidlink</string>
          </keyword>
